title: MichaelWozniak
author: MichaelWozniak
created_time: June 29, 2022, 12:56:52 PMLast edit: September 08, 2022, 08:05:02 AM by MichaelWozniak
content: Hello, we’re team Evolve and we want to introduce what mission we are going. Let’s start our adventure!https://miro.medium.com/max/1050/1*PdyaLJ5Nsx-Z-Pl4dZlPEQ.jpegWhat are weEvolve is a new gen launchpad and incubator for new projects, built on cross-chain technology, including automitized OTC for early sale of projects token, who passed the incubation process. We position ourselves as a universal tool, which combines the interaction of ordinary users and technologically equipped startups. An ordinary user (investor) will not need to have certain knowledge in cryptocurrency to use our platform. Projects will be summarized in plain language and our main goal is take these projects to the next level and give them the opportunity to develop. Due to theese to the listed opportunities, we create long-term relationships between an ordinary user and a startup. At the same time, we still have partnerships with a startup and a trusting relationship with an investor, which will give our project publicity and the opportunity to develop and be successful.What is our goalOur goal is to make it possible to conduct IDO for everyone, even if you do not have any experience of interaction with launchpads, while moderating projects and leaving those quality at the proper level. Projects undergo rigorous selection criteria by our team of experts to manually check the authenticity of projects thereby providing investors with confidence in the projects. Users choose what to invest their funds in themselves, and we guarantee the legitimacy of the projects presented on our platform.Key FeaturesThe main feature of Evolve launchpad is that we have everything you need to start your project. See, the one of the actual problems of starting the project is the lack of understanding of where to start. With our platform you can get an initial consultation, and after that you can place a project generated using our wide toolkit. Our experts will consider your startup as soon as possible. The term of consideration depends on the volume of work, but cannot exceed 7 days. You will be able to EVOLVE your project from idea stage to IDO faster than anywhere else. You will be able to solve almost all issues related to technical provision:1. Create a smart contract2. Сreate a design case for your project3. Сreate a token design4. Сreate a form for whitepaper from the template5. Create a roadmap form from a templateOur expert team provide with the support 24/7, granting you any help with your project or investments. Even after the end of the fundraiser and becoming a product independent, we’re still ready to give the support. So that, Evolve is making some kind of “turnkey” project for your idea, and will be an all-in-one solution.EvolutionAnother thing we want to share with you is our unique method of approach to the development of our project. We’re aiming to show you the evolution of the crypto world in the face of Web 1, Web 2, and Web 3. So, our plan is to make 3 versions of our platform so that to clearly show the growth of us and the Internet in generally. Web 1 version of our website if already on, so you can go check it. web2.evolve.technologyWhat’s nextIn conclusion, we would like to say that it is no secret that DeFi products have filled the cryptocurrency market. In the current situation, it is difficult to predict the movement of the crypto world and the development of new technologies, in particular blockchain. By launching our product, we hope that we will find our place in the crypto world and get support from the community, as well as get into the right development timeline. We don’t want to be another IDO launchpad, but we want to offer the ultimate fundraising solution available to everyone. We have a lot in development right now, and we’ll be announcing new features as we go along. We want to be remembered for our concept of gradual evolution, as humans once did, and as cryptocurrencies do now.A lot more thing are coming soon so…Stay and Evolve with us.Join our community on Telegram and follow us on Twitter for the latest updates!Here is our social networks: Web 2.0:  web2.evolve.technologyWeb 1.0:  evolve.technology Whitepaper: https://web2.evolve.technology/whitepaper.html TG Announcement: t.me/evolvepad_official TG Chat: t.me/pad_evolve Twitter: twitter.com/evolvepad Medium: evolve-pad.medium.com

comments.body: Quote from: teslag on June 30, 2022, 01:25:38 AMmaaf bang ini thread khusus lokal bahasa indonesia. anda salah tempat . anda harus nya post nya disini  Bitcoin Forum > Alternate cryptocurrencies > Announcements (Altcoins) mohon segera di pindahkanDia keknya gak bisa ngomong indonesia deh gan mungkin tujuannya dia post disini mau menggaet aja orang indo heheh. sorry @MichaelWozniak you should move your thread to  Bitcoin Forum > Alternate cryptocurrencies > Announcements (Altcoins) if this token you should move to Token (section)
